sentences.en: A Saturn rocket hurled Apollo aloft.
sentences.cn: 一枚土星号火箭把阿波罗宇宙飞船送入空中.

sentences.en: But in the stratosphere they can stay aloft for years, spread by fast winds known as jets, meaning the threat is global.
sentences.cn: 但在平流层，它们可以在高处停留数年，高速的风对其进行传播，这意味着全球都受到了威胁。

sentences.en: Currents of warm air keep the hang - gliders aloft.
sentences.cn: 悬挂 式 滑翔机藉着暖气流在高空飞行.

sentences.en: Droplets or ice crystals are small enough to remain suspended aloft indefinitely.
sentences.cn: 水珠或冰晶非常小,以至于能够一直悬浮在高空中.

sentences.en: He held the trophy proudly aloft.
He was suddenly jerked off his feet and borne aloft.
sentences.cn: 他突然被弹了起来,抛在空中.

sentences.en: Lay out aloft, there, half a dozen of ye -- foretopmaststuns'l!
sentences.cn: 升到桅杆顶上, 喂, 你们六个一齐动手 —— 拉起前中桅的副帆!

sentences.en: Some birds fly thousands of feet aloft.
sentences.cn: 有些鸟儿在数千尺的高处飞翔.

sentences.en: The aromatic smoke of cooking fires floated lazily aloft.
sentences.cn: 炊烟带着诱人的香味袅袅上升,随风飘荡.

sentences.en: The bearers raised the canoe aloft , adjusted the poles to their shoulders.
sentences.cn: 大汉们抬起长独木舟, 把长杆在肩膀上挪正.

sentences.en: The first fliers went aloft in balloons.
sentences.cn: 最早的飞行员乘坐气球升向空中.

sentences.en: The golfer is pictured on many of the front pages, kissing his trophy as he holds it aloft.
sentences.cn: 许多报纸的头版上都刊登了那个高尔夫球手高高举起奖杯亲吻的照片。

sentences.en: The high mountain passes the cloud layer to tower aloft.
The monument towers aloft on the square.
The sailor climbed aloft to look for land.
sentences.cn: 那个水手爬上桅顶寻找陆地.

words.tran_cn: 在空中的；在高处的；在上面的
